body.p: Most third-party extract-transform-load (ETL) and business intelligence (BI) tools use standard database interfaces, such as ODBC and JDBC, and can be configured to connect to Greenplum Database. Pivotal has worked with the following tools on previous customer engagements and is in the process of becoming officially certified:

ul.li: Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) and Reporting Services (SSRS)

body.p: Pivotal Professional Services can assist users in configuring their chosen third-party tool for use with Greenplum Database.
